title: doc: go1.1.html: decide whether to document potential increase in maximum heap size on 64-bit systems
body:
by **tylor@torbit.com**: 
The Go 1.1 release notes (http://tip.golang.org/doc/go1.1) lack any mention of the
increase in usable heap between Go 1.0.3 and 1.1 on 64-bit platforms. I think this
change was 8 GB to 128 GB or 64 GB?
